creditline: Bequest of Mr. and Mrs. Northrop Dawson, Jr.
description: female and male figures with animal faces; male figure at left with foxlike face wearing a pale blue kimono with khaki green foliage, black hat, and pink headband; female figure at right with mouselike face wearing a pink kimono with white round pattern, blue underkimono with white flowers, and black and blue headdress; text at top and LRQ; received framed
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Surimono
